title: Exploring the role of spectral Doppler in acute appendicitis
details: S Saini, MK Mittal, R Kanaujia, SG Jain, R Chejara - Egyptian Journal of Radiology …, 2024
abstract: This study evaluated the role of spectral Doppler in acute appendicitis. The aim of the study was to find out whether spectral Doppler parameters (PSV and RI) have any useful application in diagnosing acute appendicitis as an adjunct to grayscale …
